BotVersion.name: BotVersion
BotVersion.description: Represents a version of a bot or agent defined by a BotDefinition record.

BotDefinitionId.description: Required. This field relates a bot version to its parent BotDefinition record.

CopilotPrimaryLanguage.description: The primary language that the bot or agent communicates in.

CopilotSecondaryLanguages.description: A comma-separated list of additional languages that the bot or agent supports.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for this object.

Status.description: Required. Indicates whether the bot version is active or inactive. Only one version for a related BotDefinition can be active at once.

ToneType.description: Defines the tone of the bot.

VersionNumber.description: The number for this version of the bot or agent.
